about.title: About
about.subtitle: Frontend developer focused on detail, performance, and user experience.
about.bio1: I'm Juan Diego Enr√≠quez, a frontend web developer with hands-on experience building production-ready React and Astro applications. I focus on responsive, user-centered interfaces backed by clean, maintainable code ‚Äî trilingual in Spanish, English, and French.
about.bio2: I've shipped real pages and components at companies like Smiofi and Arthur J. Gallagher, integrating Firebase, REST APIs, and CMS platforms. When I'm not building, I'm exploring new tools or working on personal projects that blend design and code.

experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: A quick look at my experience.

items.description: Building and maintaining web pages and landing pages using CRM platforms, collaborating with marketing teams to deliver effective digital campaigns.
bullets: Develop and maintain pages using Ceros, HubSpot, and Sitecore
Collaborate with marketing to design and implement digital campaigns
Customize templates and optimize UX for responsive, cross-browser compatibility
Align designs, branding, and content with business goals cross-functionally

items.description: Designed and shipped reusable React components and modern frontend modules for production web pages, integrating Firebase and DevOps workflows.
bullets: Built reusable, responsive React components following UX/UI principles
Developed interfaces optimized for desktop, mobile, and tablet
Integrated Firebase (Firestore, Authentication) for secure data and user auth
Version control and CI/CD workflows with Git and Azure DevOps

items.description: Developed web applications and tools independently, combining React frontend development with UX design and Python automation.
bullets: Built React web applications with well-structured components and hooks
Created a medical appointment management system (academic project)
Built a file auto-organizer in Python to sort files by type, date, or extension
Designed responsive, mobile-first UI prototypes using Figma

items.description: Supported IT operations, server monitoring, and cross-team collaboration in a fast-paced operational environment.
bullets: Assisted in daily team organization and workforce management
Monitored and maintained servers to ensure operational uptime
Performed preventive and corrective computer maintenance
Collaborated with marketing teams for point-of-sale setup and support

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Some of the projects I've worked on.

items.title: Smiofi.com
items.description: Feature and landing pages built for Smiofi, live in production. Reusable React components integrated with Firebase authentication and Firestore.

items.title: DatAnalyst
items.description: Modular system to extract, transform, and analyze data from Firestore. Interactive visualizations, statistical analysis, and Excel/CSV export.

items.title: Luminos RMIS
items.description: Multi-page landing for Gallagher Bassett's Luminos RMIS. Typewriter hero, lead capture form with geographic validation, and services and analytics sections.

items.title: Smiofi App
items.description: Internal web application built for Smiofi. Real-time data management with Firestore, user authentication, REST API consumption, and CI/CD pipeline with Azure DevOps.

items.title: Organizer
items.description: Desktop app that automatically organizes files into folders by type and modification date. Simple, intuitive GUI ‚Äî distributable as a .exe.

items.title: Deudores App
items.description: Desktop app to manage and track debtors at an educational institution. Role-based records (students, teachers, staff), search, Excel export, and automated backups.

items.title: POS Libros
items.description: Point of sale system for a school bookstore. Inventory management, sales processing, supplier administration, price history, and Excel reports. Automatic 24-hour backups.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? I'd love to hear from you.
